KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Academic Readiness Rules
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Rules used in the evaluation of a person's academic readiness for enrollment.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Academic Readiness Anti Reqs
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Anti-requisite rules used in the evaluation of a person's academic readiness for enrollment.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Academic Readiness Co Reqs
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Co-requisite rules used in the evaluation of a person's academic readiness for enrollment.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Academic Readiness Pre Reqs
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Pre-requisite rules used in the evaluation of a person's academic readiness for enrollment.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Academic Readiness Student Eligibilities
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Enrollment eligibility rules used in the evaluation of a person's academic readiness for enrollment.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Repeatable for Credit
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Rules used for courses which are repeatable for credit.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Courses that Restrict Credit
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Rules used for courses that restrict the awarding of credit in other courses.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Recommended Preparation
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Non-enforceable rules used for recommended course preparation.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Program Completion Requirements
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Program requirements (rules) used in the evaluation of a person's program completion.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Program Entrance Requirements
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Program requirements (rules) used in the evaluation of a person's entry into a program.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Program Satisfactory Progress Requirements
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Program requirements (rules) used in maintaining minimum scholarship standards.
